mapper.update: UPDATE clubBar SET cb_hit = cb_hit+1, cb_weekHit = cb_weekHit+1
mapper.select: SELECT cb_no, cb_name, cb_tel, a_addr1, a_addr2, cb_open, cb_content, cb_hit, cb_weekHit, cb_img_cnt FROM clubBar
SELECT j.jjim, cbc.rating, cbc.cnt FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) as jjim FROM cart ) j, (SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(cbc_rating),1),0) as rating, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM clubBar_comment ) cbc
SELECT m.mt_no , m.mt_name, m.mt_tel, m.a_addr1, m.a_addr2, m.mt_url FROM motel m, clubBar c WHERE m.a_addr1 = c.a_addr1 AND c.cb_no = #{cb_no} AND rownum < 3

SELECT cbc_no, cbc_content, TO_CHAR(cbc_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday, cbc_rating, m_nick, cbc_group_tab, num FROM (SELECT cbc_no, cbc_content, cbc_regdate, cbc_rating, m_nick, cbc_group_tab, rownum as num FROM (SELECT cbc.cbc_no, cbc.cbc_content, cbc.cbc_regdate, cbc.cbc_rating, m.m_nick, cbc.cbc_group_tab FROM clubbar_comment cbc, member m WHERE cb_no=#{cb_no} AND cbc.m_email=m.m_email ORDER BY cbc_group_id DESC, cbc_group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clubBar_comment(cbc_no, m_email, cbc_regdate, cbc_content, cb_no, cbc_rating, cbc_group_id) VALUES(cbc_no_seq.nextval, 'ys@naver.com', SYSDATE, #{cbc_content}, #{cb_no}, #{cbc_rating}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(cbc_group_id)+1, 1) FROM clubbar_comment))
